whatIsRandomX.title: What is RandomX?
whatIsRandomX.content: @RandomX is Monero's ASIC-resistant proof-of-work algorithm that favors consumer-grade hardware (CPUs), making mining accessible to everyone.

soloVsPool.title: Solo vs pool mining - what's the tradeoff?
soloVsPool.content:
Solo mining maximizes independence but payouts can take a long time. Pools pay more frequently but add trust and centralization risk.

### Solo
- No pool operator, no pool fee
- Long waits between rewards
- Best for decentralization

[Solo mining guide](https://docs.getmonero.org/interacting/mining/guides/solo)

### Pool
- More frequent payouts
- Pool fee + operator trust
- Centralization risk if one pool grows too large
- Requires third-party mining software

[Browse pools](https://miningpoolstats.stream/monero)

whyP2Pool.title: Why is P2Pool "best of both"?
whyP2Pool.content:
P2Pool gives you pool-like payout frequency while keeping mining peer-to-peer and non-custodial.

- No centralized pool server
- 0% pool fee (you still pay your own node costs)
- Permissionless: anyone can join
- Trustless: funds never in custody
- PPLNS payout scheme
- Less than 0.0004 XMR minimum payout

[P2Pool announcement](/blog/2021/10/05/p2pool-released/)

hardwareExpectations.title: What should I expect from my hardware?
hardwareExpectations.content:
Monero mining is much more efficient on CPUs than GPUs. You can estimate your hashrate by comparing CPUs on XMRig's benchmark list.

[XMRig benchmarks](https://xmrig.com/benchmark)

whatMiningSoftware.title: What mining software should I use?
whatMiningSoftware.content:
For solo mining: Monero GUI or CLI wallet (CPU only). For pools or GPUs: XMRig, CSminer, or Gupax (which bundles P2Pool and XMRig).

- [Monero GUI](https://www.getmonero.org/downloads/#gui) (solo mining)
- [Monero CLI](https://www.getmonero.org/downloads/#cli) (solo mining)
- [Gupax](https://gupax.io/) (P2Pool + XMRig wrapper)
- [XMRig](https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig) (CPU/GPU miner)
- [CSminer](https://github.com/cryptonote-social/csminer) (CPU/GPU miner)
